metalscrap.name: Metal Scrap
metalscrap.description: One cubic meter of salvaged metal from outer space.

vanadium.name: Vanadium
vanadium.description: An uncommon silvery-grey transition metal. Useful for producing space-grade weapons and armor.

tritium.name: Tritium
tritium.description: A rare radioactive isotope of hydrogen. A Powerful source of energy for fusion reactions.

uranium.name: Uranium
uranium.description: A rare unstable metal, offering superb power density in high powered applications.

nanocrystals.name: Nano Crystals
nanocrystals.description: Microscopic crystalline microstructures ideal for producing nanobots and wetware.

ionizedfluid.name: Ionized Fluid
ionizedfluid.description: A blend of synthetic fluid with properties ideal for electromechanical engineering.

plasmids.name: Plasmids
plasmids.description: Soluble mutagenic fluids ideal for bio-engineering.

hexinite.name: Hexinite
hexinite.description: A rare metal that can only be mined from deep within the cores of barren planets.

antimatter.name: Antimatter
antimatter.description: Highly dangerous antimatter, capable of producing unfathomable amounts of energy if combined with matter.

carbonizedmembranes.name: Carbonized Membranes
carbonizedmembranes.description: Hardened and woven nano-membrane material, able to protect against radiation and extreme temperature.

datachip_kraken.name: Datachip: Kraken
datachip_kraken.description: An encrypted datachip containing the design for a new spacecraft.

datachip_virus.name: Datachip: Virus
datachip_virus.description: An encrypted datachip containing the design for a new spacecraft.

squadron_leader_frozen_corpse.name: Squadron Leader's Frozen Corpse
squadron_leader_frozen_corpse.description: The corpse of a former squadron leader for the Satoshi's Imperial Legion.

supercapacitor.name: Supercapacitor
supercapacitor.description: A highly-engineered energy storage device, able to store and release gigajoules of energy instantaneously.

fuelcell.name: Fuel Cell
fuelcell.description: A long-term and portable fuel cell for energy storage in starships.

energycore.name: Energy Core
energycore.description: The primary energy repository for any capable starship.

warpcore.name: Warp Core
warpcore.description: A primary warp drive core for starships, able to achieve faster-than-light travel.

shieldbattery.name: Shield Battery
shieldbattery.description: A modulated energy bank optimized for defensive shield systems.

integratedcpu.name: Integrated CPU
integratedcpu.description: An overclocked micro-processor able to synchronize additional ship modules with a hull.

reinforcedarmorplate.name: Reinforced Armor Plate
reinforcedarmorplate.description: Carbonized shell plating ready to install on a starship hull for ample protection against the hazards of deep space.

fluxreactor.name: Flux Reactor
fluxreactor.description: Modified chemical reaction unit capable of generating high amounts of power for a limited time.

fusionreactor.name: Fusion Reactor
fusionreactor.description: Radioactive phenomenon reaction unit capable of generating enormous amounts of power for powering large modules and spacecraft.

teslacoil.name: Tesla Coil
teslacoil.description: A powerful magnetic field generator that consume large amounts of energy.

nymph.name: nymph
nymph.description: Developed by the Hydra DAO to decimate roguedrones, the nymph is designed for long-range combat sporting augmented sensors and module hardpoints.

sprite.name: sprite
sprite.description: Specifically tuned for close and mid-range combat, the sprite is light, fast, and has modulated shields to mount a fortified attack.

katana.name: Katana
katana.description: The fearsome Katana is the mainstay of Satoshi's Imperial Legion. This well-rounded fighter excels at mid-range combat and offers a mix of agility and strength.

virus.name: Virus
virus.description: A ship design originating from Synth replication factories, the Virus is a pestilent destroyer with bonuses to warpcore disruption and stasis webifier range projection.

satyr.name: Satyr
satyr.description: The hallmark of the Children of Ethereum, the Satyr is an agile and deadly destroyer with an affinity for missile launchers.

hedron.name: Hedron
hedron.description: The Children of Ethereum's Hedron Transport is well known throught the Galaxy as a capable and spacious hauler, most capable of secure logistics operations.

kraken.name: Kraken
kraken.description: The flagship battlecruiser of the Darkchild's rebellion, the Kraken is a fearsome and heavily defended warship.  What it lacks in speed, it makes up for in firepower and sustainability.
